thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Fiera Capital Expands Presence In Asia With Acquisition Of Clearwater Capital Partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Fiera Capital Expands Presence In Asia With Acquisition Of Clearwater Capital Partners
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Fiera Capital Corp:
* FIERA CAPITAL EXPANDS PRESENCE IN ASIA WITH ACQUISITION OF CLEARWATER CAPITAL PARTNERS
* FIERA CAPITAL CORP - AGGREGATE CONSIDERATION PAID AT CLOSING IN CONNECTION WITH TRANSACTION WILL BE US$21 MILLION
* FIERA CAPITAL CORP - ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE SLIGHTLY ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS IN 2019
* FIERA CAPITAL CORP - AT DEAL CLOSINGCO TO PAY $12 MILLION IN CASH, WILL ISSUE $9 MILLION IN COâ€™S CLASS A SUBORDINATE VOTING SHARES
* FIERA CAPITAL SAYS ADDITIONAL CONTINGENT PAYMENT & EARNOUT CONSIDERATIONS OF UP TO $44 MILLION WILL BE PAID OVER 5 YEARS BASED ON FINANCIAL MILESTONES Source text for Eikon:
